text: Marco Fincato (born 6 October 1970 in Padua) is a former Italian cyclist. He participated in 3 Tours de France and 2 Giro d'Italia. ==Major results== ;1995 :1st GP Industria e Commercio di San Vendemiano ;1996 :1st Firenze–Pistoia :1st Memorial Nencini :2nd Giro del Lazio :2nd Subida a Urkiola :3rd Volta a Catalunya ;1998 :3rd Giro del Lazio ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Giro d'Italia cyclists
title: Marco Fincato
